name: @apptension/eslint-config-react
description: ESLint configuration for Apptension's React projects.

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish

author: Apptension
